definition: to exceed/to overtake/to surpass/to transcend/to pass/to cross/ultra-/super-
front/forward/ahead/first/top (followed by a number)/future/ago/before/BC (e.g. 前293年)/former/formerly
Italy/Italian/abbr. for 意大利[Yi4 da4 li4]

sentences.english: There is obviously a sense of priorities that we do not understand.
sentences.chinese: 这种明显的超前意识我们无法明白。

sentences.english: Advanced consciousness is leading cadre's necessary quality in new times.
sentences.chinese: 超前意识是新时代里领导干部必备的素质。

sentences.english: Sometimes doing things must have an advanced consciousness.
sentences.chinese: 有时候做事必须有超前意识。

sentences.english: The production embodies pretime consciousness to a certain extent.
sentences.chinese: 作品体现出一定的超前意识。

sentences.english: IN ITS early days New York was a city that looked forward.
sentences.chinese: 纽约城在创建之初就具有超前意识。

sentences.english: A leader in an enterprise has to show great foresight.
sentences.chinese: 作为一个企业的领导，一定要有超前意识。

definition: to stand tall and see far (idiom); taking the long and broad view/acute foresight
to be ahead of one's time/to surpass or outdo one's predecessors/to be ahead of the pack/to take the lead/advanced
to dare to be first/to pioneer (idiom)
abreast of modern developments/to keep up with the times/progressive/timely
lit. deep plans and distant thoughts/to plan far ahead (idiom)
to make a show of being original or unconventional (idiom)
